name: pact-workshop-js
description: Example JS project for the Pact workshop

scripts.can-i-deploy: npm run can-i-deploy:consumer && npm run can-i-deploy:provider
scripts.can-i-deploy:consumer: $(find ./node_modules -name pact-broker | grep -e 'bin/pact-broker$' | head -n 1) can-i-deploy --pacticipant 'PoC_consumer' --latest --broker-base-url https://test.pact.dius.com.au --broker-username dXfltyFMgNOFZAxr8io9wJ37iUpY42M --broker-password O5AIZWxelWbLvqMd8PkAVycBJh2Psyg1
scripts.can-i-deploy:provider: $(find ./node_modules -name pact-broker | grep -e 'bin/pact-broker$' | head -n 1) can-i-deploy --pacticipant 'PoC_provider' --latest --broker-base-url https://test.pact.dius.com.au --broker-username dXfltyFMgNOFZAxr8io9wJ37iUpY42M --broker-password O5AIZWxelWbLvqMd8PkAVycBJh2Psyg1

author: Matt Fellows <m@onegeek.com.au>
